revision.text: There are a number of Farming Setups not related to [[Pok√©mon_Day_Care|Breeding Pokemon faster]] or [[Shiny Chance|Increasing Shiny Chance]] that are quite useful, particularly when either mutating berries or trying to harvest mutated berries faster, or, even without mutating berries, if you just want to harvest a lot of berries to trade to the [[Berry Master]]. Here are some useful berry setups to know.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
